document_name: Repactuação dos Objetivos de Desenvolvimento do Milênio no estado de Minas Gerais

donor_name: BRA- Sec Planej de Minas Gerai
outputs.output_descr:
Project BRA/12/015 - Renegotiation of the MDGs in the state of Minas Gerais aims at strengthening the overall strategy of multidimensional poverty reduction and promotion of the Millennium Development Goals in the state of Minas Gerais.
To achieve this goal the project was structured into three main results:
1)  Multidimensional poverty reduction strategy in the state of Minas Gerais strengthened 
2) Millennium Development Goals promoted in the state of Minas Gerais
3) Efficient management of the project

project_descr: BRA/12/015 - Repactuação dos Objetivos de Desenvolvimento do Milênio no estado de Minas Gerais
project_title: BRA/12/015 Repactuação dos ODM no estado de Minas Gerais
